document.full_text: three veterans have filed a suit against the military that seeks to have them reinstated and to declare 'don't ask, don't tell' and its regulations 'unconstitutional on their face.'
document.title: veterans battle to regain 'don't ask, don't tell' losses
lines_and_colors: three veterans have filed a suit against the military that seeks to have them reinstated and to declare 'don't ask, don't tell' and its regulations 'unconstitutional on their face.'
